channel.title: Interfaces (plz help...)
channel.description:
Hey, im tryin to make an interface wich pops up when u log in, like after u hit the log in button and u log in.
But i want it to take all the place on the client, like the old runescape interface. That covered the whole screen when u logged in. How can i do this?
